segments.text: I was really glad to hear about your award , congratulations !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . Actually , I was really surprised . I mean there were a lot of qualified people out there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ Ve been working there for so long with so much sacrifice . You definitely deserve it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks a lot . I expect to see your name nominated pretty soon too . You ’ Ve been doing some great work .
segments.speaker: S2
